A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This episode 8 is a pure disappointment.
Except a very few scenes\, this movie is a disaster. 
Even the Yoda cameo is not enough to bring the movie to a better end.
Worst of all\, it is a total disrespect to Mark Hamill. He deserved something way better.
It felt like waiting most of the movie\, hoping something interesting would come.....in vain.

I've been waiting for this movie\, and had a good feeling before going to the theater\, but no\, it's not a movie for the fans.
The episode 7 smelled a bit of copy/paste\, but still was good.
Rogue One was just great\, a true good surprise.
I don't understand what happened here. I'm ok to see new ideas in the saga\, but not this.

Mixing different directors on the same trilogy was a terrible idea. These guys have a different point of view\, and you can definitely feel it
I'm scared about the last episode : recovering from this one will be too challenging.
